short_summary: The CFIA is purchasing office furniture for the Courtneypark Office in Mississauga.
description: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) intends to procure office furniture for its Courtneypark Office in Mississauga, Ontario. The procurement will be conducted in accordance with the provisions of the Government Procurement Directive.
full_summary:
> **Courtneypark Office Reconfiguration - Tender Notice**
>
> **Reference Number:** cb-749-85390995
>
> ** Solicitation Number:** 2024-00220
>
> **Title (English and French):** Courtneypark Office Reconfiguration (Reconfiguration du bureau de Courtneypark)
>
> **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de proposition) in accordance with a Supply Arrangement (Arrangement en matière d'approvisionnement)
>
> **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional
>
> **Solicitation Date:** November 23, 2023
>
> **Tender Closing Date:** December 7, 2023, at 2:00:00 PM EST
>
> **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 7, 2023
>
> **Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2024
>
> **Objective:**
>
> The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites bids for the purchase of office furniture for the Courtneypark Office in Mississauga, Ontario.
>
> **Project Background:**
>
> The CFIA seeks to acquire modern office furniture that meets its needs and complies with its workplace standards.
>
> **Scope of Work:**
>
> The scope of work includes the supply and installation of new office furniture, including desks, chairs, and other related equipment, to the Courtneypark Office.
>
> **Evaluation Criteria:**
>
> The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price.
>
> **Submission Guidelines:**
>
> Interested bidders should submit their proposals in PDF format to the contract contact email, sarah.gervais@inspection.gc.ca, by the closing date of December 7, 2023. 
>  The contact information for Sarah Gervais is:
> * Phone number: (343) 549-3749
> * Email address: sarah.gervais@inspection.gc.ca
>
> **Attachments:**
>
> * Invitation to Tender (pdf)
> * Terms and Conditions (pdf)
> * Schedule of Accommodation (pdf)
> * Amendment 1 to the RFP (pdf)
> * Amendment 2 to the RFP (pdf)
>
> **Note:** Any technical questions and inquiries should be directed to the contract contact via email.
> 
> This tender notice is made available through canadabuys.ca and is posted on the Buy and Sell platform of public
